job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: should be good in react amp angularltbrgt should have good experience in azure blob servicebus queue app service function appsltbrgt should be good at net c codingltbrgt full stack developer ltbrgt years of sde experienceltbrgtltbrgt month contract with microsoftltbrgt pto includedltbrgt health insurance available ltbrgtltbrgtwhat makes this role interesting ecommerce continues to be one of the fastest growing and exciting areas of technology in both consumer and commercial channels the cloud amp enterprise omnichannel team owns delivery of highlyscalable services to enable the sale and fulfillment of st and rd party hardware and devices through digital and physical storefronts as well as the connection to rd party retailers our vision is to deliver radical customer delight at high margins for hardware through manufacturing agility fulfillment flexibility and world class device care we are looking for senior developers to help us modernize customer device experiences after purchase you will work on initiatives across device lifecycle management expansion of the device repair ecosystem developing new device value added services device subscription models and other reverse logisticscare capabilitiesltbrgt
